snippet.title: Machiavelli the Prince gameplay (PC Game, 1995)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Machiavelli the Prince, Dos PC game produced by MicroProse  in 1995 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/machiavelli-the-prince/1601/
Exploring the interface and the continent in this complex political simulator.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Custer's Last Command - https://youtu.be/TxD_bdpWxh0
Wargame Construction Set 2: Tanks! - https://youtu.be/ralM7CTxhdo
Pure Wargame, The - https://youtu.be/Yw7Bhu_--5Y
